messages: b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (16:07): So, as a totally experimental thing, I tried cloning the html testsuite repository onto github
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (16:07): https://github.com b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea/html-testsuite/
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (16:07): Mainly for the possibility of code review
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:08): do you want @WHATWG to announce it somehow?
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:08): and if so, how?
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (16:09): I have no strong desire for it to be announced
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (16:10): More than I just did by writing on public, logged, irc, I mean
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (16:10): Let me work out if it is useful first :)
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (16:17): Is Hixie on vacation?
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:18): well he's not here
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:24): Does anyone know about IE's support for big5 /  big5-hkscs? Ideally based on what Windows 7 ships
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (16:24): http://longsonr.wordpress.com/2012/01/06/svgtests-interface-implemented/ <- sigh
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:24): not interested in pre-Vista
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:26): b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea: do we ship similar crap?
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (16:28): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e, what do you mean by "here"?
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:30): standards world
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (16:30): oh well
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:31): hmm http://www.microsoft.com/hk/hkscs/ seems to suggest that via Unicode you get there, but not via big5-hkscs
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (16:32): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e, what specific questions are you asking with regard to big5 / big5-hkscs ?
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:33): I think I found my answers already
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:34): Windows has PUA-support for the characters HKSCS introduced and the label "big5-hkscs" means "big5" which uses PUA afaict
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:34): but then other browsers support "big5-hkscs" independently from "big5" (different encoding) and do not map to PUA
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (16:34): Yeah, that PUA story is quite famous.
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:35): so I guess if you are in HK you really want UTF-8
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (16:36): I've not seen a big5-hkscs page but I am not in HK either. These characters are out of BMP right?
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:38): maybe? I've no idea

b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (16:44): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: I'm not sure. It wouldn't surprise me, but hopefully we're not *adding* that kind of crap years after it became obvious that it's a design anti-pattern
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (16:46): It's obviously odd if PUA in DOM can get displayed as normal text.
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:49): system fonts
7f9405da4034bf43083e64b57302a8e6 (16:52): You doom us all to inhuman toil for the One whose Name cannot be expressed in the Basic Multilingual Plane.
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:57): is the whole BMP full?
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (16:58): No I don't think so.
a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (16:58): No
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:58): at least Thai has some space I just found out
9dfea2f9bd9114520591dceb20d528a1 (17:16): "Our new years resolution should be at least 1920x1080"
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (17:19): neh
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (17:20): higher!
